price: 他们说：“指安拉发誓，安拉确已从我们当中拣选了你。从前，我们确是有罪的。”
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ لَقَدۡ ءَاثَرَكَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَإِن كُنَّا لَخَٰطِـِٔينَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi laqad ātharaka al-lahu ʿalaynā wa-in kunnā lakhāṭiīna
